channel.title: Comfy Project on ComfySpace
channel.description: Recent content in Comfy Project on ComfySpace

item.title: Playcar
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> A guide to robotics Comfy Projects Playcar An RC Car that's easy to build & fun to play with. Your browser does not support the video tag. Components Here are some components you need for this project. Most of these can be used for multiple projects! Raspberry Pi Zero 2W Small but mighty. Packed with plenty computing power, this bad boy controls are of the motor operations. Quantity 1 Price 15$ LM2596 Buck Converter Regulates voltage from the AA batteries to power the Raspberry Pi Quantity 1 Price 5$ DC Motor This is the horsepower for Playcar.

item.title: Rappit
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> A guide to robotics Comfy Projects Rappit Your adorable humanoid robot friend Components Here are some components you need for this project. Most of these can be used for multiple projects! Raspberry Pi Zero 2W Small but mighty. Packed with plenty computing power, this bad boy is the brain of the operation. Quantity 1 Price 15$ Small 3S Lipo battery Small but packs lots of juice. Quantity 1 Price 13$ PCA9685 16 Channel PWM Servo Driver You can control a bazzilion servo motors with this.

item.title: Rappit
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> A guide to robotics Comfy Projects Rappit An AI friend you can talk to! Components Here are some components you need for this project. Most of these can be used for multiple projects! Raspberry Pi Zero 2W Small but mighty. Packed with plenty computing power, this bad boy is the brain of the operation. Quantity 1 Price 15$ Rechargable AA batteries Easy to use, sustainable & available everywhere. Quantity Pack of 4 + charger Price ~15$ Power bank (alternative to AA batteries) Chances are you have one around the house.
